resource_requirements.memory: Unknown (depends on the dataset and model size)
resource_requirements.storage: Unknown (depends on the dataset and model size)

software_requirements.slurm: Used for job scheduling and resource allocation
software_requirements.gcc: Version 4.9 required for compilation (via module load)
software_requirements.nvidia_cuda: Version 10.0 required for GPU acceleration (via module load)
software_requirements.python: Required for running the training script
software_requirements.pytorch: May be required depending on the implementation of the training script
